\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{color}

\sloppy
\definecolor{lightgray}{gray}{0.5}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\begin{document}

    
    \begin{verbatim}
function [x, f, grad, s, a_star, n_objectives] = conjugant_gradient(f,...
    grad, x, alpha, obj, gradobj, plot_bool, s)

    mag = sqrt(s(:,end)'*s(:,end)); % magnitude

    [a_star, n_objectives] = parabolic_line_search(false, obj, x, f,...
        s, alpha, mag);

    x(:,end+1) = x(:,end) + a_star*s(:,end)/mag;
    f(:,end+1) = obj(x(:,end));
    grad(:,end+1) = gradobj(x(:,end));

    n_objectives = n_objectives + 1;

    Beta = grad(:,end)'*grad(:,end)/(grad(:,end-1)'*grad(:,end-1));
    s(:,end+1) = -grad(:,end) + Beta*s(:,end);

 end
\end{verbatim}



\end{document}
